metadata.synopsis: One-liners for female human guard outside of the Baldurs Mouth office
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the Guard outside the Baldurs Mouth offices near coords 72, 41, -49

0.speaker: Guard Baalfe
0.text: This ain't the worst posting, I suppose. Beats guarding the docks, place reeks.

1.speaker: Guard Baalfe
1.text: Dunno what you said in there, pal, but you're not to go back in.

2.speaker: Guard Baalfe
2.text: Watch yourself in there - sarky bastards, these writer types.
